replies.author: Raymond_Min
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp 默认组(builder或者default) -essentials.nuke
mangaddp 默认组(builder或者default) -essentials.suicide
mangaddp 默认组(builder或者default) -essentials.god

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
取消玩家这三个权限
essentials.nuke
essentials.suicide
essentials.god

replies.author: lucien寓言
replies.txt_content: 貌似这些指令是只有OP权限才可以只用的啊。。。

replies.author: lucien寓言
replies.txt_content: 第二个指令是玩家可以用的，你如果是不想玩家用的话只需要禁用第二个就行了

replies.author: lucien寓言
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp builder essentials.suicide
上面搞错了。。是这个。。。你也可以直接把builder改成默认组，不过服务器默认组就是builder

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
prozhong 发表于 2015-5-25 14:26
取消玩家这三个权限
essentials.nuke
essentials.suicide
给予他们

“-essentials.nuke”
“-essentials.suicide”
“-essentials.god”
三个权限  记得加-号
